title: Top 10 Growth Opportunities in Residential, Commercial, HoReCa, and Institutional Water Solutions, 2024
summary: The water solutions industry is experiencing growth due to increasing demand for energy-efficient technologies and resource-saving solutions. Key trends include rainwater harvesting, graywater reuse, digital and robotic technologies in swimming pools, waterless appliances, advanced membranes, water reuse in circular systems, and water from air solutions. A buy-a-service solutions business model is also emerging.

title: Best Washing Machines for 2024
summary: The article provides a guide to buying a washing machine, including considerations such as size and capacity, types (top-loading or front-loading) and styles (freestanding or stackable). It also touches on washing cycles and features offered by different models. The article does not describe any specific products or processes that meet the criteria for green innovation.
